title: Synthesis of an SBA-15 supported NiPtN catalyst for dehydrogenation of hydrazine hydrate
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,689-696
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01243C, Communication
Muhammad Ridwan, Risda Maulida Afifah, Indri Yati, Rika Tri Yunarti
In this study, a NiPtN/SBA-15 catalyst was synthesized by a wet-impregnation method, which was validated using EDXRF, CHN analysis, XRD, SAA, and FESEM-EDS analysis and showed good catalytic activity towards dehydrogenation of hydrazine hydrate with a selectivity of 96.18% and TOF of 1133 hâˆ’1.
